articles.description: Build-up to Euro 2024 as the England squad prepares to fly to Germany with Scotland already there, plus all the latest football and transfer news.
articles.title: Euro 2024 build-up plus football and transfer latest

articles.description: Sale flanker Tom Curry has been named in England coach Steve Borthwick’s 36-man squad for the tour of Japan and New Zealand.
articles.title: Tom Curry: Sale flanker named in England squad for summer tour

articles.description: George Russell finished third at the Canadian Grand Prix and left Montreal with mixed feelings despite Mercedes' significant progress.
articles.title: Canadian Grand Prix: 2024: George Russell rues 'missed opportunity' for Mercedes

articles.description: India's match against Pakistan at the T20 World Cup shows that cricket has arrived in the United States and the sport is gathering momentum.
articles.title: India vs Pakistan: T20 World Cup game shows cricket has arrived in the United States

articles.description: Will England finally win a major tournament this summer or might Euro 2024 prove to be manager Gareth Southgate's last stand?
articles.title: Euro 2024: For Gareth Southgate's England, it may be now or never

articles.description: French Open winner Carlos Alcaraz plans to have a tattoo of iconic landmark the Eiffel Tower as a permanent reminder of the tournament he loved as a child.
articles.title: French Open 2024: Carlos Alcaraz plans Eiffel Tower tattoo after Roland Garros win

articles.description: Will it be England, France, Germany or Scotland? Opta predicts each country's chances of winning Euro 2024
articles.title: Euro 2024: Opta predicts each country's chances of winning - England, France, Germany, Scotland

articles.description: Scottie Scheffler holds off Collin Morikawa to win the PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament - his fifth title of the year.
articles.title: Scottie Scheffler wins PGA Tour's Memorial Tournament to claim fifth title of 2024

articles.description: Lionel Messi plays his first international for almost seven months as Argentina warm up for the Copa America with a 1-0 win over Ecuador.
articles.title: Argentina 1-0 Ecuador: Lionel Messi returns and Angel di Maria scores in Chicago

articles.description: Jrue Holiday top scores for the Boston Celtics as they take a 2-0 lead against the Dallas Mavericks in the NBA finals.
articles.title: NBA: Boston Celtics lead 2-0 v Dallas Mavericks in NBA Finals
